name: RobotBatteryLaser
description:
Robot Battery Laser

You are the blue spaceship! Wait for your laser to charge up, take aim around the asteroids, and fire to destroy the enemy drone ship!

Controls

Arrow Keys - Left/Right Movement
X - Fire Laser

Game

Robot Battery Laser is a modification of the game Battery Laser by Bennett Foddy that turns the two player game into a one player experience against an AI. The music in Robot Battery Laser is heavily inspired / remixed from the music from the original game. This modification was made during a one week period in Pico-8.
